chapters.title: Prologue: Distinctions
chapters.info: Hopper, p. 19—One of the wolves. Hopper died in a Whitecloak attack in real life, but he lives on in the World of Dreams, Tel'aran'rhiod. He is usually the first (and often only) wolf that finds Perrin there. Perrin thinks he would laugh as hard as a wolf could laugh at the title “Wolf King.” While Faile was missing, Perrin entered the World of Dreams—what he calls the Wolf Dream—and tried to kill Hopper. Hopper forgave him, of course, and is now trying to teach Perrin how to control himself in the Dream.
